INSERT INTO public."tbchangerequest" 
(requestername, requestermail, title, 
systemid, reasonid, typeid, riskid, description, 
statusid, areaid, forecaststart, forecastend, 
 bugsid, userstoriesid, closuredatetime, createdat)
  VALUES ({{RequesterMail.text}},
					{{RequesterMail.text}},
					{{TitleChangeRequest.text}},
					{{System.selectedOptionValue}},
					{{Reason.selectedOptionValue}},
					{{appsmith.store.typeChangeRequest}},
					{{appsmith.store.riskGrade}},
					{{Description.text}}, 
					{{this.params.status}},
					{{Area.selectedOptionValue}},
				 	{{forecastStart.selectedDate}},
					{{forecastEnd.selectedDate}},
				 {{TxtBugs.text}},
				 {{TxtUserStories.text}},
				 null,
				 NOW())
				 RETURNING id;

INSERT INTO public."tbchangerequest" 
(requestername, requestermail, title, 
systemid, reasonid, typeid, riskid, description, 
statusid, areaid, forecaststart, forecastend, 
 bugsid, userstoriesid, closuredatetime, createdat)
  VALUES ({{RequesterMail.text}},
					{{RequesterMail.text}},
					{{TitleChangeRequest.text}},
					{{System.selectedOptionValue}},
					{{Reason.selectedOptionValue}},
					{{appsmith.store.typeChangeRequest}},
					{{appsmith.store.riskGrade}},
					{{Description.text}}, 
					{{this.params.status}},
					{{Area.selectedOptionValue}},
				 	{{forecastStart.selectedDate}},
					{{forecastEnd.selectedDate}},
				 {{TxtBugs.text}},
				 {{TxtUserStories.text}},
				 null,
				 NOW())
				 RETURNING id;

INSERT INTO public."tbassessment" (changerequestid, statusid, aprovadorid, comment, validateAt)
  VALUES({{this.params.changeRequestId}}, 3, null,'Aprovado automaticamente', NOW()) RETURNING id;

INSERT INTO public."tbassessment" (changerequestid, statusid, aprovadorid, comment, validateAt)
  VALUES({{this.params.changeRequestId}}, 3, null,'Aprovado automaticamente', NOW()) RETURNING id;

select riskid, r.description  from "tbriskImpactProbability" tip 
inner join "tbrisk" r
on tip.riskid = r.id 
where impactid = {{Impacto.selectedOptionValue}} and probabilityid = {{Probabilidade.selectedOptionValue}}

select riskid, r.description  from "tbriskImpactProbability" tip 
inner join "tbrisk" r
on tip.riskid = r.id 
where impactid = {{Impacto.selectedOptionValue}} and probabilityid = {{Probabilidade.selectedOptionValue}}

actionConfiguration.body:
select 
t.id,
t.hour,
t2.area as "Segunda-feira",
t3.area as "Terça-feira",
t4.area as "Quarta-feira", 
t5.area as "Quinta-feira",
t6.area as "Sexta-feira",
t7.area as "Sábado",
t8.area as "Domingo"

from tbschedule t 
left  join tbarea t2 
on t."monday" = t2.id 
left join tbarea t3 
on t."tuesday" = t3.id 
left join tbarea t4 
on t."wednesday" = t4.id 
left join tbarea t5
on t."thursday" = t5.id 
left join tbarea t6
on t."friday" = t6.id 
left join tbarea t7
on t."saturday"  = t7.id 
left join tbarea t8
on t."sunday" = t8.id 
ORDER by id

select 
t.id,
t.hour,
t2.area as "Segunda-feira",
t3.area as "Terça-feira",
t4.area as "Quarta-feira", 
t5.area as "Quinta-feira",
t6.area as "Sexta-feira",
t7.area as "Sábado",
t8.area as "Domingo"

from tbschedule t 
left  join tbarea t2 
on t."monday" = t2.id 
left join tbarea t3 
on t."tuesday" = t3.id 
left join tbarea t4 
on t."wednesday" = t4.id 
left join tbarea t5
on t."thursday" = t5.id 
left join tbarea t6
on t."friday" = t6.id 
left join tbarea t7
on t."saturday"  = t7.id 
left join tbarea t8
on t."sunday" = t8.id 
ORDER by id

select t.Name, t.email, t2.area  from tbassessors t 
left join tbarea t2 
on t.areaid = t2.id

select t.Name, t.email, t2.area  from tbassessors t 
left join tbarea t2 
on t.areaid = t2.id

actionConfiguration.body:
select MUD.id, requestername, requestermail, title, sis."system" , mot.reason , tipo.type, risco.description as "risco", mud.description as "descricao", status.status, setor."area", forecaststart, forecastend, bugsid, userstoriesid, mod."name" as "Moderator", ass."validateAt" as "AssessementDatetime", ass."comment" as "AssessementComment" 
from tbchangerequest MUD
left join tbsystem sis  
on mud.systemid  = sis.id 
left join tbreason mot 
on mud.reasonid  = mot.id 
left join tbtype tipo 
on mud.typeid  = tipo.id 
left join tbrisk risco 
on mud.riskid  = risco.id 
left join tbstatus status 
on mud.statusid = status.id
left join tbarea setor 
on mud.areaid = setor.id 
left join tbassessment ass
on mud.id = ass.changerequestid 
left join tbassessors mod
on ass.assessorsid = mod.id
ORDER  BY ID DESC
LIMIT {{TbMyChangeRequest.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(TbMyChangeRequest.pageNo - 1) * TbMyChangeRequest.pageSize}};

select MUD.id, requestername, requestermail, title, sis."system" , mot.reason , tipo.type, risco.description as "risco", mud.description as "descricao", status.status, setor."area", forecaststart, forecastend, bugsid, userstoriesid, mod."name" as "Moderator", ass."validateAt" as "AssessementDatetime", ass."comment" as "AssessementComment" 
from tbchangerequest MUD
left join tbsystem sis  
on mud.systemid  = sis.id 
left join tbreason mot 
on mud.reasonid  = mot.id 
left join tbtype tipo 
on mud.typeid  = tipo.id 
left join tbrisk risco 
on mud.riskid  = risco.id 
left join tbstatus status 
on mud.statusid = status.id
left join tbarea setor 
on mud.areaid = setor.id 
left join tbassessment ass
on mud.id = ass.changerequestid 
left join tbassessors mod
on ass.assessorsid = mod.id
ORDER  BY ID DESC
LIMIT {{TbMyChangeRequest.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(TbMyChangeRequest.pageNo - 1) * TbMyChangeRequest.pageSize}};

actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO public.tbassessment (changerequestid, statusid, assessorsid, "comment", "validateAt")
  VALUES({{this.params.changeRequestId}}, {{this.params.status}}, {{this.params.idAssessor}}, '{{Comment.text}}', NOW());

INSERT INTO public.tbassessment (changerequestid, statusid, assessorsid, "comment", "validateAt")
  VALUES({{this.params.changeRequestId}}, {{this.params.status}}, {{this.params.idAssessor}}, '{{Comment.text}}', NOW());

select MUD.id, requestername, requestermail, title, sis."system", mot.reason , tipo."type", risco.description "risk", status.status, area."area", forecaststart, forecastend, bugsid, userstoriesid, Mud.description  from tbchangerequest MUD
left join tbsystem sis  
on mud.systemid = sis.id 
left join tbreason mot 
on mud.reasonid = mot.id 
left join tbtype tipo 
on mud.typeid = tipo.id 
left join tbrisk risco 
on mud.riskid = risco.id 
left join tbstatus status 
on mud.statusid = status.id
left join tbarea area 
on mud.areaid = area.id
inner join tbassessors apro 
on mud.areaid = apro.areaid  
where statusid = 2
and typeid = 2
and apro.email = {{appsmith.user.email}}

select MUD.id, requestername, requestermail, title, sis."system", mot.reason , tipo."type", risco.description "risk", status.status, area."area", forecaststart, forecastend, bugsid, userstoriesid, Mud.description  from tbchangerequest MUD
left join tbsystem sis  
on mud.systemid = sis.id 
left join tbreason mot 
on mud.reasonid = mot.id 
left join tbtype tipo 
on mud.typeid = tipo.id 
left join tbrisk risco 
on mud.riskid = risco.id 
left join tbstatus status 
on mud.statusid = status.id
left join tbarea area 
on mud.areaid = area.id
inner join tbassessors apro 
on mud.areaid = apro.areaid  
where statusid = 2
and typeid = 2
and apro.email = {{appsmith.user.email}}

actionConfiguration.body:
select MUD.id, requestername, requestermail, title, sis."system", mot.reason, tipo.type, risco.description as "risco", mud.description as "descricao", status.status, setor."area", forecaststart, forecastend, bugsid, userstoriesid, mod."name" as "Moderator", ass."validateAt" as "AssessementDatetime", ass."comment" as "AssessementComment" 
from tbchangerequest MUD
left join tbsystem sis  
on mud.systemid = sis.id 
left join tbreason mot 
on mud.reasonid  = mot.id 
left join tbtype tipo 
on mud.typeid  = tipo.id 
left join tbrisk risco 
on mud.riskid  = risco.id 
left join tbstatus status 
on mud.statusid = status.id
left join tbarea setor 
on mud.areaid = setor.id 
left join tbassessment ass
on mud.id = ass.changerequestid 
left join tbassessors mod
on ass.assessorsid = mod.id
ORDER  BY ID DESC
LIMIT {{TbChangeRequest.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(TbChangeRequest.pageNo - 1) * TbChangeRequest.pageSize}};

select MUD.id, requestername, requestermail, title, sis."system", mot.reason, tipo.type, risco.description as "risco", mud.description as "descricao", status.status, setor."area", forecaststart, forecastend, bugsid, userstoriesid, mod."name" as "Moderator", ass."validateAt" as "AssessementDatetime", ass."comment" as "AssessementComment" 
from tbchangerequest MUD
left join tbsystem sis  
on mud.systemid = sis.id 
left join tbreason mot 
on mud.reasonid  = mot.id 
left join tbtype tipo 
on mud.typeid  = tipo.id 
left join tbrisk risco 
on mud.riskid  = risco.id 
left join tbstatus status 
on mud.statusid = status.id
left join tbarea setor 
on mud.areaid = setor.id 
left join tbassessment ass

on ass.assessorsid = mod.id
